content.stimulus_en: How (do) ________ you get to the station?
The journey (take) ________ two hours.
I (travel) ________ by train many times.
There (be) ________ a long delay at the airport.
Have you ________ (buy) your ticket yet?
She (not/like) ________ traveling by boat.
The flight from London to New York took eight hours.
We a took taxi to the train station.
There was a three-hour delay due to bad weather.
I traveled have across Europe by train.
She doesn't like traveling by boat because she gets seasick.
Have bought you your plane tickets yet?
